Package data.collect

Class PlayersStatsGetter

java.lang.Object
data.collect.PlayersStatsGetter
public class PlayersStatsGetter extends Object
This class is used to get player statistics from various football clubs. It scrapes data from the website fbref.com and stores it in a Table object.

      private Map<String,String> clubsUrls

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayersStatsGetter

      public PlayersStatsGetter()
      Constructor for the PlayersStatsGetter class. It initializes the clubsUrls map with the names of the clubs and their respective urls.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method used for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      args -

    • getPlayersStats

      public tech.tablesaw.api.Table getPlayersStats(String clubName)
      This method returns a Table object containing the players statistics for a given club.
      Parameters:
      clubName - The name of the club for which the statistics are returned.
      Returns:
      Table object containing the players statistics for a given club.

    • extractTableData

      private static List<List<String>> extractTableData(org.jsoup.nodes.Element table)
      This method returns a List of Lists of Strings containing the players statistics for a given club. This is part of changing the data into something more useful.
      Parameters:
      table - is object containing information about players scraped from fbref.com
      Returns:
      List of Lists of Strings containing players statistics for a given club.

    • playersStats

      private static List<List<String>> playersStats(String websiteUrl)
      This function takes url of websites chooses tables from html of website and then chooses first table and transforms it to List of Lists of Strings.
      Parameters:
      websiteUrl - is url of website from which we want to take data.
      Returns:
      List of Lists of Strings containing players statistics for a given club prepaired to create Table object.

    • playersStats

      private static List<List<String>> playersStats(String websiteUrl, int whichTable)
      This function takes url of websites chooses tables from html of website and then takes chosen table and transforms it to List of Lists of Strings. Currently not used in the project.
      Parameters:
      websiteUrl - is url of website from which we want to take data.
      whichTable - is number of table we want to take from website.
      Returns:
      List of Lists of Strings containing players statistics for a given club prepaired to create Table object.

    • createTableFromListByColumns

      private static tech.tablesaw.api.Table createTableFromListByColumns(List<List<String>> data, String tableName)
      This function takes List of Lists of Strings and creates Table object from it by columns. It propably omits first row of data. Currently not used in the project.
      Parameters:
      data - is List of Lists of Strings containing players statistics for a given club prepaired to create Table object.
      tableName - is name of table we want to create.
      Returns:
      Table object containing players statistics for a given club ready to use, transform, etc.

    • createTableFromListByRows

      private static tech.tablesaw.api.Table createTableFromListByRows(List<List<String>> data, String tableName)
      This function takes List of Lists of Strings and creates Table object from it by rows. It propably omits first column of data.
      Parameters:
      data - is List of Lists of Strings containing players statistics for a given club
      tableName - is name of table we want to create.
      Returns:
      Table object containing players statistics for a given club ready to use, transform, etc.

    • getPlayersFromTable

      public List<String> getPlayersFromTable(tech.tablesaw.api.Table table)
      This function takes Table object and returns List of Strings containing names of players from this table. (In practice it takes all strings from StringColumn with index 0 from the table)
      Parameters:
      table - is Table object containing players statistics for a given club.
      Returns:
      List of Strings containing names of players from this table.

    • getAllClubNames

      public List<String> getAllClubNames()
      This function returns List of Strings containing names of all clubs for which we have data. In practice, it takes all keys from clubsUrls TreeMap and returns them as List of Strings.
      Returns:
      List of Strings containing names of all clubs for which we have data.

    • getImportantColumnNamesFromTable

      public static List<String> getImportantColumnNamesFromTable(tech.tablesaw.api.Table table)
      This function returns Names of columns which are important for us, which means that they contain statistics about players, which we want to use in our project and visualizations.
      Parameters:
      table - is Table object containing players statistics for a given club.
      Returns:
      List of Strings containing names of columns which are important for us.

    • getImportantColumnIdsFromTable

      public static List<Integer> getImportantColumnIdsFromTable(tech.tablesaw.api.Table t)
      This function returns Ids of columns which are important for us, which means that they contain statistics about players, which we want to use in our project and visualizations.
      Parameters:
      t - is Table object containing players statistics for a given club.
      Returns:
      List of Integers containing Ids of columns which are important for us.
